FILE: cm371630v11.0.txt
DYAD: ARMENIA - IRAN
RIVALRY: RIV1028
DISPUTE(S): MID3564 MID4285 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20190314
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20190318

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID3564 

TERRMID: MID3564 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID3564 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID3564 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID3564 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID3564 from Gibler 2018, this is the Nagorno-Karabakh War, a territorial war fought between Armenia and Azerbaijan. In 1993, Turkey and Iran both protested that the war was endangering their border security, pulling them into this MID. Coded third party link to territorial MID because this was connected to a territorial dispute outside this dyad. 

MARITMID: MID3564 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID3564 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID3564 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID3564 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID3564 1 -- civil war MID
CIVWARMID-CER: MID3564 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID3564 the Nagorno-Karabakh War also involved militarized rebel groups organized along ethnic lines. Coded civil war MID because this was connected to civil war activity in Armenia, within this dyad. 

CIVWARLINK: MID3564 1 -- civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID3564 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: MID3564 the Nagorno-Karabakh War also involved militarized rebel groups organized along ethnic lines. Coded civil war link because this was connected to civil war activity in Azerbaijan, outside this dyad. (The disputed area contained ethnic groups and rebels connected to ethnic Armenians and Azeris.) 

COUPMID: MID3564 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID3564 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID3564 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID3564 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID4285 

TERRMID: MID4285 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID4285 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID4285 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID4285 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID4285 from cm narrative and Gibler 2018, Armenian forces shot down an Iranian cargo plane as it flew over Nagorno-Karabakh on its flight from Moscow to Tehran. Coded third party link to territorial MID because this occurred over territory disputed between Armenia and Azerbaijan, outside this dyad. 

MARITMID: MID4285 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4285 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID4285 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4285 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4285 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4285 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID4285 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4285 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID4285 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4285 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4285 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4285 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID3 1993-2001:

MID4285
rivalry=371630 nationa=ARMENIA nationb=IRAN MID4285 19940317-19940317 
 revtype1a=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=USE OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=1-25 DEATHS fatalpb=13
lhostb=NO MILITARIZED ACTION 

Armenian forces apparently shot down an Iranian cargo plane as it flew over Nagorno-Karabekh on its flight from Moscow to Tehran. First and last day of dispute was on 3/17/1994.

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
